about_the_game:
Craftomation 101 original soundtrack composed by Arman Mkhitarian. All the files are in two formats: Uncompressed FLAC and MP3.

By purchasing this Soundtrack, you're supporting the game's development and gaining access to exclusive content that has been carefully curated for you.

To find the downloaded files click the Right Mouse Button on this Soundtrack in your Steam Library > Properties > Installed Files > Browse.
